title: The Implications for Cycling if UCI Boss David Lappartient Wins (or Loses) the IOC Presidency
content:
Lappartient's IOC candidacy is one of the biggest backroom power plays in cycling history. What will it mean for cycling in the Olympics and beyond? We dive in.

Read the full article at The Implications for Cycling if UCI Boss David Lappartient Wins (or Loses) the IOC Presidency on Velo.
author: ahood
